backend/main.mo: Actor managing projects and resumes with add and query functions backed by Map collections.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing structure, features, and updates across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, typography, and utility classes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and attaching it to the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component switching between landing and case study views with smooth-scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactLink: Contact button group for email, resume, and LinkedIn using shared Button and ResumeCta components.
frontend/src/components/site/Motion.tsx: RevealOnScroll component animating elements into view using IntersectionObserver with reduced‑motion support.
Section and Container layout primitives providing consistent spacing and width constraints.
frontend/src/components/site/ResumeCta.t: Resume download button that checks static asset availability and falls back to a disabled state if missing.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: About section rendering updated bio text with scroll‑reveal animation.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Hero section displaying wordmark, updated strategic messaging, and CTAs with background image styling.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Le: Contact section with heading, short prompt, and ContactLinks rendered with scroll‑reveal.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: Displays a list of projects as clickable cards that navigate to case studies with scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Va: Renders value proposition items from site content in a responsive grid with scroll reveal effects.
Simple footer with attribution, styling, and responsive layout container.
Sticky header with reordered navigation (About first), resume CTA, and LinkedIn link using smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/content/assets.json: Defines static asset metadata, currently only a resume PDF entry.
frontend/src/content/caseStudies.json: Provides structured content for case studies including metadata, images, and sectioned text.
frontend/src/content/contact.json: Contains contact information such as email and LinkedIn URL.
frontend/src/content/projects.json: Lists project summaries used for the Selected Work section, including titles, descriptions, and thumbnails.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.json: Stores hero text, value propositions, and about content for the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects whether the user prefers reduced motion via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Checks if a static asset exists by issuing a HEAD request and exposes availability state.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports base CSS from a parent index.css file.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CaseStudyPage.tsx: Displays a full case study page with images, sections, and back navigation, using scroll animations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the landing page layout with header, footer, and multiple content sections, passing navigation handling to SelectedWorkSection. It serves as the main entry page for the portfolio site.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme values. It enables plugins and defines design tokens used across the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, requirements, features, and architectural notes for building the portfolio site. Acts as metadata guiding implementation and content integration.
